title: 1 Chronicles 8:1
text: NOW Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:2
text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:3
text: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:4
text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:5
text: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:6
text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

title: 1 Chronicles 8:7
text: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:8
text: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:9
text: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:10
text: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma.  These were his sons, heads of the fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:11
text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:12
text: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:

title: 1 Chronicles 8:13
text: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

title: 1 Chronicles 8:14
text: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:15
text: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:16
text: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;

title: 1 Chronicles 8:17
text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:18
text: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;

title: 1 Chronicles 8:19
text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:20
text: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:21
text: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;

title: 1 Chronicles 8:22
text: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:23
text: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:24
text: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:25
text: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;

title: 1 Chronicles 8:26
text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:27
text: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:28
text: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men.  These dwelt in Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:29
text: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:

title: 1 Chronicles 8:30
text: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:31
text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:32
text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah.  And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:33
text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi-shua, and Abinadab, and Esh-baal.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:34
text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-baal; and Merib-baal begat Micah.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:35
text: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:36
text: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:37
text: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:

title: 1 Chronicles 8:38
text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan.  All these were the sons of Azel.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:39
text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:40
text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty.  All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
